posts.post_content:
I'm looking to sell or trade the low-grade copy of the T205 Turner card pictured below. The card was previously graded SGC 10, before I cracked it out of the holder. It does have a small hole through the cap.

Asking $85 shipped, or willing to trade for another short print of equal grade (I need Bresnahan (mouth open), Raymond, or Suggs).

Thanks!
